description: Tools for managing change schedules and release calendars

tools.name: get_weekly_change_calendar
tools.description: Retrieves the change calendar for a specified week, showing all scheduled changes with their details, timing, and status

week_start_date.description: Start date of the week in YYYY-MM-DD format. If not provided, defaults to current week

include_completed.description: Whether to include completed changes in the results

tools.name: filter_high_risk_changes
tools.description: Filters and retrieves changes marked as high-risk based on impact level, affected systems, or risk assessment scores

time_range.description: Time range to search for high-risk changes (e.g., 'this_week', 'next_7_days', or date range)

include_emergency.description: Whether to include emergency changes in the results

tools.name: get_change_details
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information about specific changes including risk assessment, approval status, implementation plan, and rollback procedures

change_ids.description: Array of change request IDs to get details for

include_approvals.description: Whether to include approval workflow status and approver details
